did.unittitle: Garrit S.K. Remsen accounts and collection records for Flatlands School District No.2
did.abstract: Handwritten financial accounts and collection records for School District No. 2 in the town of Flatlands in Brooklyn, dated 1894-1895 and recorded by Collector Garrit S.K. Remsen.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Gift of Miss Augusta G. Smith, 1957.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This small collection is housed in a single folder.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Garrit S.K. Remsen accounts and collection records for Flatlands School District No.2, 1977.493, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was rehoused and the finding aid revised by Dee Bowers in 2023.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Handwritten financial accounts and collection records for School District No. 2 in the town of Flatlands in Brooklyn, recorded by Collector Garrit (also spelled Garret) S.K. Remsen. The accounts date from 1894 and 1895.
